known_issues: An attached/embedded section is not visible to the user ("not able to see anything in this attached section").

existing_features.title: Fix the HeroSection metric/value text so numeric values render visibly (Years Experience, Forecast Accuracy, Tools Mastered, Projects Completed) by correcting the gradient text class usage that currently makes the text transparent without a valid background gradient.

Ensure any other HeroSection gradient-text elements using the same invalid class (e.g., tagline and the floating 95% card) render visibly by either (a) replacing `bg-gradient-accent` with the existing `gradient-accent` utility where used with `bg-clip-text text-transparent`, or (b) adding a CSS utility alias so `bg-gradient-accent` produces the intended gradient background.

projectName: Fix invisible metric values in Hero stats section
